attributes.action: refuse to allow government health policies to be dictated by spurious and alarmist statistics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are bombarded with spurious statistics regarding health. We should insist that epidemiologists' studies should attain probabilities greater than 95% and relative risks greater than 100% before being considered as relevant for the purpose of forming policy.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
